text: +972 Magazine is a left-wing news and opinion online magazine, established in August 2010 by a group of four Israeli writers in Tel Aviv. Noam Sheizaf, a co-founder and the +972 chief executive officer, said they wanted to express a new and "mostly young voice which would take part in the international debate regarding Israel and Palestine". They named the website in reference to the 972 international dialing code, which is shared by Israel and the Occupied Palestinian Territory. They are the English language edition, the Hebrew edition it called Local Call. ==References== == Other websites == * Category:Online magazines Category:Mass media in Israel Category:Left-wing politics in Israel Category:Israeli news media Category:politics of Israel Category:Anti-Zionism Category:Tel Aviv Category:Pages with unreviewed translations
title: +972 Magazine
